cookieNotice: We and selected third parties use cookies or similar technologies for technical purposes and, with your consent, for functionality, experience, measurement, and marketing (personalized ads) as specified in the cookie policy. Denying consent may make related features unavailable.

consentOptions.instruction: You can freely give, deny, or withdraw your consent at any time.

impressum.title: Impressum
impressum.responsibleContent: Responsible for content according to ยง 55 Abs. 2 RStV

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introText: At [Your Company Name], we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and sharing of your personal information.
privacyPolicy.googleAnalyticsText: We use Google Analytics to monitor and analyze web traffic and to understand where our visitors are coming from. Google Analytics may capture your IP address, but no other personal information is captured.
privacyPolicy.googleAdSenseText: We display ads from Google AdSense, which uses cookies to display relevant ads based on your preferences. Google AdSense may collect information about your browsing habits to make advertising relevant to you.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We use cookies to store information about your preferences and to enable certain website functionalities. Cookies are small data files stored on your browser by the website. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
privacyPolicy.localStorageText: We use local storage to retain user preferences and ensure consistent user experiences. Local storage is a web storage solution that allows websites to store data in a browser on a device.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [Your Contact Email].

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.acceptanceText: By accessing and using [Your Software Service Name],  you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.
termsAndConditions.serviceProvisionText: [Your Company Name] provides the [Your Software Service Name] as a service to its users. Users are responsible for providing their own hardware and internet access to use the service.
termsAndConditions.paymentText: Users agree to pay any subscription fees associated with the use of [Your Software Service Name]. Fees are non-refundable, even if you stop using the service.
termsAndConditions.limitationText: [Your Company Name] shall not be liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use or inability to use the service, or from unauthorized access to user data.
termsAndConditions.intellectualPropertyText: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property related to [Your Software Service Name] are owned by [Your Company Name] and may not be used without prior written permission.
termsAndConditions.terminationText: [Your Company Name] reserves the right to terminate access to the service for any user who violates these terms.
termsAndConditions.changesText: [Your Company Name] may update these terms from time to time. Users will be notified of any significant changes.
termsAndConditions.contactUsText: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at [Your Contact Email].
